Google Inc.
Blogger DMCA Complaints
Attn: Blogger Legal Support/DMCA Complaints

Re: Cosmopolitan - Esquire Magazines

I represent Hearst Communications, Inc., publisher of Cosmopolitan and Esquire magazines, and I write to put you on notice of copyright infringement found on celebritysource.blogspot.com. The particulars of our complaint are as follows:

1. The copyrighted works at issue are:

three photographs of potential Cosmopolitan magazine covers featuring Ashlee Simpson that were initially published by Cosmopolitan at http://ivillage.opinionware.com/owuser/cosmopolitan/model3/022207_simpson24.htm;


two photographs of potential Cosmopolitan magazine covers featuring Jessica Biel that were initially published by Cosmopolitan at http://ivillage.opinionware.com/owuser/cosmopolitan/cover2/040507_jessicabiel_24.htm

An entire feature from Esquire magazine featuring Halle Berry. The material from Esquire magazine is being published in this month's issue of Esquire (May). It has not yet even been published on Esquire's own website.

The Ashlee Simpson and Jessica Biel photos were removed from Cosmopolitan's website after we learned of the infringement.

2. The infringing works all appear on celebritysource.blogspot.com as follows:

Ashlee Simpson photos at: celebritysource.blogspot.com/2007/04/ashlee-simpson-cosmopolitan-magazine.html.

Jessica Biel photos at: celebritysource.blogspot.com/2007/04/jessica-biel-cosmopolitan-july-07.html

Halle Berry photos at: celebritysource.blogspot.com/2007/04/halle-berry-esquire-magazine.html

3. I can be reached at dweaver@hearst.com or c/o Hearst Communications, Inc., 300 West 57th Street, New York, NY 10019.

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to represent Hearst Communications, Inc., the exclusive licensee of these copyrighted images.

Sincerely,

Debra S. Weaver
